thread.title: Egypt congratulates Cuba on the triumph of its Revolution
thread.title_full: Egypt congratulates Cuba on the triumph of its Revolution

author: Jose Eloy Richards Richards
title: Egypt congratulates Cuba on the triumph of its Revolution
text:
In a letter sent today to the Cuban embassy in Cairo, CEFA president Kamal Gaballa reiterated the organization’s full support to the defense of the achievements attained by that Caribbean island since January 1, 1959.
He also highlighted the firmness of Cuban society in its struggle against foreign conspiracies, especially “the hostile policies pursued by the government of the United States”.
In this regard, he criticized the measures implemented to strangle the economy of that nation and “the intensification of an unjust financial, commercial and economic blockade that has been in place for more than six decades”.
We also denounce the miserable political and media campaigns against Cuba, in an attempt to create a state of internal unrest, the text underlined.
The CEFA, in turn, thanked “the noble positions of solidarity of the friendly Republic of Cuba with the legitimate Arab issues, at the core of which is the Palestinian cause”.
We reaffirm our commitment to continue all efforts to promote brotherly, friendly and cooperative relations between Egypt and Cuba at all levels in order to realize the hopes of the two friendly peoples, it concluded.
